uk.ac.cam.caret.sakai.rwiki.service.api

Interface EntityHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseEntityHandlerImpl, XLSTChangesHandler, XSLTEntityHandler

    public interface EntityHandler
    An entity handler matches resource references and handles how those resource references interact witht he Entity provider. One Entity provider may have one or more Entity handlers. Entity Handlers are in general singletons, that are thread safe and operate on oobjects passed in through the stack or thread local.
    Author:
    ieb
